AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals suspected of crossing the border illegally, potentially traveling and being stopped based on appearance and other slight circumstances, found in a pickup truck camper with unwashed and unkempt occupants, attempting to hide from view when approached by United States Border Patrol, reacting physically to the beam of a flashlight, including ducking and scrambling in response to a bright light, with their hygienic appearance being subjectively assessed by United States Border Patrol agents
